f31762.value: The  Company  and  its  subsidiaries  (“the  Group”)  are  engaged  in  the  research  and  development,production and  marketing  of data  communication products in  the field  of  metropolitan  area  networks  and  of bio-medical products, primarily laboratory diagnostics and eco-med equipment. The Bio-Medical division also distributes products of third parties.
